p: Dr. Akanksha Gupta did Ph.D. in Materials Chemistry from Department of Chemistry, University of Delhi, Delhi, India. She has vast experience in synthesis, crystallography, and characterization of several mixed metal oxides viable for potential applications in cathode materials for lithium‚Äêion batteries, magnetism and photocatalysis. Dr. Gupta has published several research articles, reviews and book chapters in journals of international repute. Currently, she is an Assistant Professor in Sri Venkateswara College, University of Delhi, INDIA.
